entry.title: 0.3.24 RC3 Build
entry.summary: The Bitcoin 0.3.24 RC3 tar has been uploaded to http://dl.dropbox.com/u/29653426/Bitcoin%200.3.24%20RC3.tar.bz2. The SHA1 hash for the file is af85f46201bfffaf38fe4d64f3aa357ac03b51e1. The developer, Matt, disagrees that 0.3.24 shouldn't handle incompatible wallets cleanly. However, he notes that gitian-win32.yml is broken and advises users to remove lines pertaining to it. He also reminds users to build gitian signed and email signed as always.
